nodes.text: Eliimy was a Hutt female who was allegedly the wife of Jabba Desilijic Tiure.

During a standoff against Trusk Berinato, Han Solo claimed to have stolen the wife of Jabba the Hutt, Eliimy the Hutt, from him, referring to her as "a beautiful woman." It was unclear whether Eliimy had been real or merely a fictional fabrication created by Solo.
